expression: X xor Z xor ((Y xor ¬X) || Z=>Y) xor ¬T

dnf.text: (T AND  X AND  Y AND  Z) OR  (T AND  (NOT X) AND  Y AND  (NOT Z)) OR  (T AND  (NOT X) AND  (NOT Y) AND  Z) OR  ((NOT T) AND  X AND  (NOT Y)) OR  ((NOT T) AND  X AND  (NOT Z)) OR  ((NOT T) AND  (NOT X) AND  Y AND  Z) OR  ((NOT T) AND  (NOT Y) AND  (NOT Z))
